duties_responsibilities.duty: Calculate annuity estimates, review retirement coverage, and process corrections in compliance with regulatory standards.
Develop and automate processes for routine retirement tasks and inform employees on necessary forms/applications for retirement options.
Track retirement application requests and support the completion of necessary documentation for retirement applications.
Create and process personnel action notifications, review and sign beneficiary forms, and ensure completion of payout for survivors of deceased employees.
Resolve inquiries and requests related to employee benefits coverage and premiums, and perform other assigned duties as required.
